metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39908 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In all versions of GitLab CE/EE starting from 0.8.0 before 14.2.6, allversions starting from 14.3 before 14.3.4, and all versions starting from14.4 before 14.4.1 certain Unicode characters can be abused to commitmalicious code into projects without being noticed in merge request orsource code viewer UI.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
